headings: Prepare for master’s-level licensure to advance your social work career.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plans and Courses
What Can You Do With a Master of Social Work Degree?
Why Earn My M.S.W. Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Our M.S.W. degree can be completed on campus or 100% online. Whichever option you choose, you will receive immersive instruction in an array of social issues with different populations in a wide variety of practice settings. You will also gain valuable practical experience through field education placements and research.

Our comprehensive program also allows you to specialize in either Advanced Generalist Practice or Clinical Practice. On graduating, you will be prepared to pursue licensure as a Licensed Master Social Worker (LMSW) or Licensed Clinical Social Worker (LCSW).
Our B.S.W. and M.S.W. degrees are accredited by theCouncil on Social Work Education’s Board of Accreditation.

Our experienced faculty are all licensed clinical social workers. They are also dedicated to delivering the best possible learning experience, whether it’s on campus or online. Plus, our small class sizes mean you get the individual attention you deserve.
Our faculty are a primary reason we are one of the fastest growing in-person and online M.S.W. programs in Texas.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.

The Health Resources and Service Administration reports that a 30% increase in the number of master’s and doctoral-level social workers will be needed through 2030 to meet the demand for advanced practitioners.

Advanced social work practitioners enjoy careers in case management, family social work, clinical social work, criminal justice, medical social work, school social work, social services administration, and many types of counseling.

If you earned your Bachelor of Social Work (B.S.W.) degree from a program accredited by the Council on Social Work Education (CSWE), you may qualify for Advanced Standing. This would allow you to complete your M.S.W. degree at ASU in as little as 12 months.

Gain a global perspective of social work as you travel across Europe in our annual summer study abroad program. As you visit the Czech Republic, Romania and the Netherlands, you’ll meet social work students and faculty at our partner universities and work with professionals at social services agencies. There is also plenty of fun to be had on various cultural excursions.

Our online Master of Social Work degree has been ranked in the “Best Online Master’s in Social Work Programs” for 2023 by EduMed.org. We have also received top national rankings for quality and affordability from prestigious publications like Fortune Magazine, and from additional online higher education guides, including Intelligent.com and AcademicInfluence.com.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
